short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display TCGPlayer.com prices as (CAD$) Canadian Dollars.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TCGPlayerToCad add the Canadian Dollars (CAD$) price next to the US Dollars price on TCGPlayer.com website.

Features:
* Display the Canadian price when viewing single products or a category.
* Historic graph, customer also purchased price conversion.
* Horizontal view listings support.
* Viewing seller shop support.
* Price guide list support.
* Deck list, format list, event deck list support.
* Fast and Plug and Play.

Updates:
* v1.1 Fixed a problem when not using all digit of a price in element1 of ustToCadProduct.js
* v1.2 Added customer also purchased carousel and top right historypricechart normal/foil price conversion, horizontal view support with listings, fixed a but to read article 0 on horizontal view. seller shop support. some code refactors.
* v1.3
+ decklist cards, mouseover card preview, decks 'n' events, format deck trending, event decklists, ~ price conversions.
+ route matches for decks and deckList.
+ two more card price conversions in historyPriceGraph.
+ price conversion function refactor, converPrice(element, 0-1).
+ price-guide conversion.
* fixed horizontal listing problem with directbytcgplayer product.
* fixed latest sales 4 vs 5 columns when there's an icon problem.
* adjusted currentPricePoints and latestSales to process correctly with view sales history popup.
* fixed infinite NaN refresh bug in sellerFeedback conversion.
* fixed customerAlsoPurchased caroussel problem of not converting second page and unbolding the font.
* renamed variable names to be more representative.

To Do:
* Mobile version.
* Add batch cards price conversion?

Source:
https://github.com/skywalk1411/tcgplayertocad
